text.section: Any adult or minor may be adopted under this subtitle.

section.section: Any adult may petition a court for adoption.

text.section: Before a petition is filed under this subtitle, a petitioner shall move for, and a court shall order that, a case pending under Subtitle 3 of this title be closed.
If the marital status of a petitioner changes before entry of an order under this subtitle, the petitioner shall amend the petition accordingly.
